metadata.note: All values include CO2, CH4, and N2O converted to CO2e. Verified against DEFRA 2024 published factors. Do not modify — AI must never override these values.

natural_gas.source: DEFRA 2024 — Natural gas, gross calorific value

diesel.source: DEFRA 2024 — Diesel (average biofuel blend, market mix)

petrol.source: DEFRA 2024 — Petrol (average biofuel blend, market mix)

biomass_wood_chips.source: DEFRA 2024 — Wood chips, biomass (biogenic CO2 excluded per GHG Protocol)
biomass_wood_chips.note: Biogenic CO2 not counted under GHG Protocol. Only non-biogenic CH4/N2O included.

company_car_avg.source: DEFRA 2024 — Average car (market average, petrol + diesel fleet mix)
company_car_avg.note: Use vehicle-specific factor if actual consumption data is available

company_car_electric.source: DEFRA 2024 — Battery electric vehicle (Scope 1 = zero; Scope 2 counted via electricity)
company_car_electric.note: WTW (well-to-wheel) emissions counted under Scope 2 via electricity consumption
